name: Gateway to the Savage Frontier
description:
Gateway to the Savage Frontier is a RPG game developed by Stormfront Studios and Beyond Software. It came out on 01-01-1991. It was published by Strategic Simulations. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
You can play Gateway to the Savage Frontier on Commodore / Amiga and PC. The game is sold via GOG.
It was scored by Linwood Taylor.
